column1: A funeral service will be held Saturday at 11:00 AM in the chapel of Skinner & Smith Funeral Home with Rev. Dick Westbrook officiating. Burial will follow in Erwin Memorial Gardens with Military Honors.    The family will receive friends Friday from 6 to 8 p.m. at Skinner & Smith Funeral Home and at other times at the home of Carolyn and Jerry Manning in Erwin.
